titleStmt.title: The best way of disposing of hammer'd money and plate as well for the advantage of the owners thereof, as for raising one million of money, in (and for the service of) the year 1697. By way of a lottery.
titleStmt.author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T. N. = Thomas Neale.
Reproduction of the original in the Hunterian Museum, Glasgow University Library, Glasgow, Scotland.
